feed.title: TamanduaFlag
feed.subtitle: A minimal, portfolio, sidebar, bootstrap Jekyll theme with responsive web design and focuses on text presentation.

entry.title: Hijacking
entry.summary: Enumeration Nmap PORT STATE SERVICE 22/tcp open ssh 80/tcp open http Port 80 This page has a login page and we can access with default credentials, like: admin/admin After pass the login, we can see the page has a comment option When we click “submit” the page create an alert saying that we need to insert XML code. We can see a random character and we receive empty fields Now we ...

entry.title: Eyes
